summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Shelby Street, from West Park Drive to East Park Drive; Hamlin Street, from West Park Drive to East Park Drive; East Park Drive, from Shelby Street to Hamlin Street; West Park Drive, from Shelby Street to Hamlin Street, by constructing wateramins and sewers therein, together with all necessary appurtenances for the proper drainage, sewerage, water service and fire protection of said district; and Montlake Boulevard, from the south line of Old Lake Washington Canal Right- of-way to the north line of Montlake Park, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing watermains therein, together with all necessary appurtenances for the proper water service and fire protection of said district, all in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 37580; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
